select
distinct
from POSITIONS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into POSITIONS (SNO, SYMBOL, EXCHANGE, VT_SYMBOL, VT_POSITION_NAME, NAME, SIZE, LONG_POS, LONG_YD, LONG_TD, LONG_POS_FROZEN, LONG_YD_FROZEN, LONG_TD_FROZEN, LONG_PNL, LONG_PRICE, SHORT_POS, SHORT_YD, SHORT_TD, SHORT_POS_FROZEN, SHORT_YD_FROZEN, SHORT_TD_FROZEN, SHORT_PNL, SHORT_PRICE, LAST_PRICE, MODE, ACCOUNT_ID) values (#{sno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vtSymbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vtPositionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longPos,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longYd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longTd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longPosFrozen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longYdFrozen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longTdFrozen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longPnl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{longPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shortPos,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shortYd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shortTd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shortPosFrozen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shortYdFrozen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shortTdFrozen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shortPnl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shortPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lastPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{mode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
